```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("nflfastR")
library(espnscrapeR)
library("ggplot2")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("runrunrun.csv")
df$outcome = ifelse(df$play_type == "run", 1, 0) # 1 if run, 0 otherwise (pass)
```

```{r}
model1 <- glm(outcome ~ as.factor(prev_play_1) + as.factor(prev_play_2) + as.factor(prev_play_3) + ydstogo, data=df, family="binomial")
summary(model1)
```
